A4.text: Wilma Mankiller relocated with her parents in the 1950s to the San Francisco Bay Area.

A5.text: The 2000 US Census indicated that 67% of Native Americans lived in urban areas, and by the 2010 Census the percentage of urban Native people had grown to 71%.
